sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' import Tabs from 'react-bootstrap/Tabs' import Tab from 'react-bootstrap/Tab' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import stockXLogo from '../images/stockx.png' import goatLogo from '../images/goat.png' import flightClubLogo from '../images/flightclub.png' import stadiumGoodsLogo from '../images/stadiumgoods.png' import sneaksLogo from '../images/Sneaks_Logo.png' import ImgCarousel from './ImgCarousel'; import PriceTable from './PriceTable'; import Spinner from 'react-bootstrap/Spinner' const ProductCard = (props) => { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [sneaker, setSneaker] = useState({}); const myHeaders = new Headers({ "Content-Type": "application/json", Accept: "application/json" }); useEffect(() => { setSneaker(props.sneaker) if(Object.keys(sneaker).length != 0){ console.log(sneaker); setLoading(false); } }, ); return(
BACK TO ALL SHOES
{loading ?
:}

{props.name}

From
${props.minPrice} on
{props.description}
  • Make: {sneaker.make}
  • Colorway: {sneaker.colorway}
  • Style ID: {sneaker.styleID}
  • Release Date: {sneaker.releaseDate}
  • Retail Price: ${sneaker.retailPrice}.00
) } export default ProductCard;
